TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypeConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 會提供轉換實值型別為其他型別，以及存取標準值和子屬性的統一方式。

span.span: Provides a unified way of converting types of values to other types, as well as for accessing standard values and subproperties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常見的轉換子的類型是以文字表示的來回轉換。The most common type of converter is one that converts to and from a text representation. 類別的型別轉換子繫結至類別。The type converter for a class is bound to the class with a . 除非遭到覆寫這個屬性，則繼承自這個類別的所有類別會都使用相同的型別轉換子的基底類別。Unless this attribute is overridden, all classes that inherit from this class use the same type converter as the base class. > [!NOTE] > 一般類型系統，不會存取型別轉換子直接。For general type system purposes, do not access a type converter directly. 相反地，使用存取適當的轉換程式。Instead, access the appropriate converter by using . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱提供的程式碼範例。For more information, see the code examples provided. **附註**基於 XAML，XAML 處理器會搜尋直接管理，而不會搜查。**Note** For XAML purposes, a XAML processor searches for the directly, instead of going through . 您希望的情況下執行個體從程式碼，或在 WPF 中建立的共用執行個體的資源，是可接受的建構不直接參考或其他反映和型別系統支援。For cases where you do want a instance from code, or where you create a shared instance in WPF resources, it is acceptable to construct it directly without referencing or other reflection and type system support. 類別衍生自通常會被參照做為一部分的 XAML 處理器如何將屬性或初始設定文字值轉換從標記 （這是原本就是一個字串），並產生物件的執行階段表示法。Classes derived from are often referenced as part of how a XAML processor converts an attribute or initialization text value from markup (which is inherently a string) and generates an object for a run-time representation. 實作自訂型別作者想要的 XAML 支援類型轉換行為，通常支援自己的唯一類別`ConvertFrom`從字串的行為。Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a class that supports their own unique `ConvertFrom` behavior from a string. 此行為可讓從提供做為 XAML 屬性值的字串類型轉換，並提供 XAML 處理器，讓物件可以產生已剖析的物件圖形中，從字串中，建立物件所需的支援。This behavior enables type conversion from the string provided as a XAML attribute value and provides a XAML processor with the support needed to create an object from the string, so that the object can be produced in a parsed object graph. 自訂型別或成員的自訂型別由套用定義，具有屬性參考自訂實作。Custom types or members of custom types are indicated by applying to the definitions, with the attribute referencing the custom implementation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XAML 概觀的型別轉換子](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-for-xaml-overview.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立型別轉換子的執行個體，並將它繫結至類別。The following code example shows how to create an instance of a type converter and bind it to a class. 實作轉換子，類別`MyClassConverter`，必須繼承自類別。The class implementing the converter, `MyClassConverter`, must inherit from the class. [!code-cpp[Classic TypeConverter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TypeConverter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TypeConverter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 當您有具有列舉類型的屬性時，查看的列舉值是否有效，才能設定屬性。When you have a property that has an enumeration, check to see whether an enumeration value is valid before setting the property. 在下一步 的程式碼範例需要列舉型別，稱為`MyPropertyEnum`已宣告。The next code example requires that an enumeration called `MyPropertyEnum` has been declared. [!code-cpp[Classic TypeConverter Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic TypeConverter Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic TypeConverter Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 另一個一般類型轉換器的用法是將物件轉換為字串。Another common type converter usage is to convert an object to a string. 下列程式碼範例會列印出名稱儲存在變數`c`。The following code example prints out the name of the stored in the variable `c`. [!code-cpp[Classic TypeConverter Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic TypeConverter Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic TypeConverter Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/VB/source.vb#3)] 您也可以使用類型轉換器來轉換值，請從其名稱中的下一步 的程式碼範例所示。You can also use a type converter to convert a value from its name, as shown in the next code example. [!code-cpp[Classic TypeConverter Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CPP/source.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic TypeConverter Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Classic TypeConverter Example#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/VB/source.vb#4)] 在下列程式碼範例中，您可以使用類型轉換器，印出一組標準物件支援的值。In the following code example, you can use a type converter to print out the set of standard values that the object supports. [!code-cpp[Classic TypeConverter Example#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Classic TypeConverter Example#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Classic TypeConverter Example#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TypeConverter Example/VB/source.vb#5)]

span.para:
繼承自來實作您自己的轉換需求。當您繼承自這個類別時，您可以覆寫下列方法:-若要支援自訂類型轉換，覆寫， ， ，和方法。 -若要轉換必須重新建立物件來變更其值的型別，覆寫和方法。 -若要轉換支援屬性的型別，覆寫和方法。如果您想要轉換的類別沒有屬性，而且您需要實作屬性，您可以使用類別作為基底實作的屬性描述項。當您繼承自，您必須覆寫和方法。 -若要將轉換類型，可支援標準值，請覆寫， ，和方法。
衍生的型別可能會標示為或是，但您類型的執行個體可以使用建立類別。不要撰寫安全的程式碼假設呼叫端受信任。相反地，假設呼叫端可能會建立您的型別執行個體，在部分信任中。 如需一般 (非 XAML) 用途的型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱 [如何： 實作類型轉換器] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)或 [通用類型轉換] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada)。

Inherit from to implement your own conversion requirements. When you inherit from this class, you can override the following methods: - To support custom type conversion, override the , , , and methods. - To convert types that must re-create the object to change its value, override the and methods. - To convert types that support properties, override the and methods. If the class you are converting does not have properties, and you need to implement properties, you can use the class as a base for implementing the property descriptors. When you inherit from , you must override the and methods. - To convert types that support standard values, override the , , and methods.
Your derived type might be marked as or , but an instance of your type can be created with the class. Do not write insecure code by assuming the caller is trusted. Assume instead that callers might create instances of your type in partial trust. For more information about type converters for general (non-XAML) purposes, see [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56) or [Generalized Type Conversion](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/49253ae6-7657-4810-82ab-1176a6feeada).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作自訂型別作者想要的 XAML 支援類型轉換行為，通常支援的類別從字串的行為。Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a class that supports behavior from a string. 此行為可讓從提供做為 XAML 屬性值的字串類型轉換，並提供 XAML 處理器，讓物件可以產生已剖析的物件圖形中，從字串中，建立物件所需的支援。This behavior enables type conversion from the string provided as a XAML attribute value and provides a XAML processor with the support needed to create an object from the string, so that the object can be produced in a parsed object graph. 自訂型別或成員的自訂型別由套用定義，具有屬性參考自訂實作。Custom types or members of custom types are indicated by applying to the definitions, with the attribute referencing the custom implementation. 基於 XAML 用途，您不通常提供分支實作根據`culture`。For XAML purposes, you do not typically provide branching implementations based on `culture`. 這是因為在開發環境內容中，先行編譯的 XAML 是與執行階段的特定文化特性資訊 XAML 不相關的 XAML 類型轉換。This is because XAML is precompiled in a development environment context, and culture-specific information for runtime XAML is not relevant for XAML type conversion. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XAML 概觀的型別轉換子](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-for-xaml-overview.md).

span.span: The conversion cannot be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最常用於轉換的型別為相互轉換字串物件。The most common types to convert are to and from a string object. 這個實作會呼叫物件上的物件是否有效，而且如果目標類型是字串。This implementation calls on the object if the object is valid and if the destination type is a string. `context` 參數可以用於擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從該環境叫用的。Use the `context` parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. 這個參數可以是`null`，所以一定要檢查。This parameter can be `null`, so always check it. 甚至，內容物件上的屬性可能會傳回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. 實作自訂型別作者想要的 XAML 支援類型轉換行為，通常支援的類別從字串的行為。Custom type authors that intend to support a type conversion behavior for XAML typically implement a class that supports behavior from a string. 可能也會實作這些型別轉換子來支援 XAML 序列化。These type converters might also implement to support serialization back to XAML. 一些 XAML 序列化案例無法充分滿足單獨。Some XAML serialization scenarios cannot be adequately addressed with alone. 在這些情況下，可能需要同時定義處理序列化的情況下，否則會由處理。In these cases, it may be necessary to also define a that handles the serialization cases that would otherwise be handled by . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

span.para: 如果您想要轉換的型別支援的屬性，請覆寫這個方法。 參數可以用於擷取環境的其他資訊，而這個轉換子就是從該環境叫用的。這個參數可以是，所以一定要檢查。此外，內容物件上的屬性可以傳回。屬性陣列用來篩選陣列。屬性可以有混合和物件。篩選由下列規則:-會被視為萬用字元使用，它會比對具有的屬性集中的屬性。 -如果屬性沒有相同類別的屬性不包含在傳回的陣列。 -如果屬性是的執行個體、 的屬性必須完全相符或不包含傳回陣列中。 -如果指定執行個體和它的預設屬性，即使沒有任何執行個體，它包含在傳回的陣列屬性中。

Override this method if the type you want to convert supports properties. Use the parameter to extract additional information about the environment from which this converter is invoked. This parameter can be , so always check it. Also, properties on the context object can return . The attributes array is used to filter the array. The attributes can have a mix of and objects. Filtering is defined by the following rules: - A is treated as a wildcard; it matches a property that has the in its set of attributes. - If a property does not have an of the same class, the property is not included in the returned array. - If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array. - If an instance is specified and it is the default property, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中所有不存在於陣列之名稱的屬性會依字母順序新增至結尾。All properties in the collection that are not already in the array of names are added alphabetically to the end. 如果`names`參數是空陣列或`null`，依字母順序排序集合中的所有屬性。If the `names` parameter is an empty array or `null`, all the properties in the collection are sorted alphabetically.
